Articles About Contact Speaking
Jen Looper

Developer Advocate | Speaker | Author | Builder of Interesting Things

Vue Vixens

Vue Vixens offers free workshops and meetups for foxy people who identify as women. Join us at a local skulk or in a tech conference!

Elocute

Elocute is a mobile and web app designed to replace the language lab. Students and teachers of second languages, rejoice!

QuickNoms

QuickNoms is a web and mobile app that helps students find recipes that are quick and easy. Five ingredients, fifteen minutes...QuickNoms!

ThingLearn

Thinglearn is a suite of products designed to teach kids about the internet of things in a fun, interactive, hands-on way. Build things and learn the science behind them!

Snappy Squirrel

Learn about personal finance by reading stories and playing games featuring a little squirrel who is saving to build a new nest. Educational fun for the whole family!

Practice Buddy

Practice Buddy is a mobile app for music teachers and students. Login and track your practicing progress. Teachers, monitor and incentivize your students.

PocketRave

Be the light and life of your party with PocketRave, a web and mobile app with a hardware integration that lights up the room.
